definition: paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)

sentences.english: Assuming the High Septon had not put her to death by the time he got back to the city.
sentences.chinese: 姑且認爲當他回去的時候她還沒有死在大主教手裏。

sentences.english: Leave on one side the question of whether the Geither plan is a good idea or not.
sentences.chinese: 我們姑且拋開蓋特納計劃好與壞的問題。

sentences.english: I don't believe in them,but let's imagine.
sentences.chinese: 我並不相信，但請姑且假設。

sentences.english: You can use the little room as a studio for the nonce .
sentences.chinese: 你可把這個小房間，姑且當作工作室。

sentences.english: But make a virtue of it by all means.
sentences.chinese: 你姑且就把這件事當做我的德性吧。

sentences.english: Dheck back next week. Maybe someone will cancel their trip.
sentences.chinese: 下週來看看吧，容或有人姑且勾銷旅行。

sentences.english: But it purports to be true.
What will you do in the vacation? I will look after my younger sister temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 假期裏你精壯什麼？我將姑且賜顧幫襯我妹妹。

sentences.english: Or maybe we just really wish it were true.
sentences.chinese: 或者我們姑且相信這就是真的。

sentences.english: There are several (portable) johns in the construction site.
sentences.chinese: 在建築場地有幾個姑且茅廁。

sentences.english: Since he wants to have a talk with you. I don't see any harm in goi.
sentences.chinese: 他既然想跟你談談，你就姑且去見他一面吧。

sentences.english: Quite apart from what had happened earlier, what had I meant by that handful of coppers?
sentences.chinese: 以前的事姑且擱起，這一大把銅元又是什麼意思？

definition: to throw out/to get rid of
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
something to be taken up later in speech or writing
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
